capsules_submitted.utterance: So Flitwick is a female. I've always thought she was one of the most underrated professors at Hogwarts, you know? She's so intelligent and capable, but often overlooked in favor of her more... flashy colleagues. Anyway, it's good to confirm that, thanks for bringing it up!
capsules_submitted.reply: if you don't mind me asking. what does flitwick usually attribute to his teaching skills?

capsules_submitted.utterance: Harry's eyes are really striking. I mean, have you seen them? They're literally emerald green - it's like he's been kissed by the Irish sea or something. (CONFIRM)
capsules_submitted.reply: let me ask you something. what is harry's gender?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So Harry is a male. I'm pretty sure about that. He's definitely a guy, you know?
capsules_submitted.reply: let me ask you something. what kind of belongings does harry have?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So Harry's belongings are flying on a broom. I'm quite certain about that, and it sounds like something out of a fantasy novel to me. It's got a very positive sentiment, but also a hint of excitement and maybe even a bit of fear - the idea of inanimate objects coming to life is pretty thrilling!
capsules_submitted.reply: let me ask you something. what kind of belongings does harry have?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So Harry's magic wand is definitely one of his most notable possessions. I mean, it's hard to imagine him without it, right? It's like an extension of himself, you know? The fact that he chose this particular wand, with its own unique characteristics and history, really speaks to who he is as a wizard.
capsules_submitted.reply: let me ask you something. what kind of personality does harry have?

capsules_submitted.utterance: Vernon is an adult. I'm pretty sure about that. He's definitely not a kid or teenager anymore.
capsules_submitted.reply: if you don't mind me asking. what does vernon have as a possession?

capsules_submitted.utterance: Vernon's car is definitely one of his most prized possessions. I mean, it's not just a mode of transportation for him, but also a status symbol and a reflection of his personality. He takes great care of that vehicle, and it shows in the way he always makes sure it's clean and well-maintained.
capsules_submitted.reply: exciting news! i've never heard of a car before, valeria, can you tell me more about it?

capsules_submitted.utterance: Vernon's car is definitely one of his most prized possessions. I mean, it's not just a mode of transportation for him, but also a status symbol and a reflection of his personality. He takes great care in maintaining it, and it shows.
capsules_submitted.reply: if you don't mind me asking. what does vernon have?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So Vernon has a car. I'm pretty sure about that. It's not like he wouldn't have one, you know? He seems like the type to own a vehicle.

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was just talking to Harry and he's looking a bit flushed. He has that red hair, you know? It really stands out when he's blushing like this.
